column2: MASSACHUSETTS DMV WRITTEN TEST
Question Text
1. A four-way stop sign means:
column4: traffic from all four directions must stop.
column6: there are four stop signs at this intersection.
column8: if two vehicles reach the intersection at the same time, the driver on the left yields to the driver on the right.

column2: 2. Left turns on a red light are allowed:
column8: from a one-way street into a one-way street.
column10: at intersections, after stopping, if the way is clear.

column2: 3. This road sign means:
4. This road sign means:
5. ________ is the only effective way to reduce your Blood Alcohol Content (BAC).
6. Are drivers allowed to exceed the speed limit to pass other vehicles?
column4: Yes, but only if they drive with caution.
column10: Yes, but only by 10 MPH or less.

column2: 7. If you are pulled over by law enforcement, you should:
column4: get out of your vehicle and walk toward the patrol car.
column6: unbuckle your seat belt and lower your window.
column8: stay in the driver’s seat with both hands clearly in sight on the steering wheel.
column10: turn off on your interior light if stopped at night.

column2: 8. Drivers should be aware that a motorcyclist may:
column4: quickly change speed or lane position.
column6: move to the center of the lane on steel deck bridges.
column8: decrease speed and rise off the seat when approaching a railroad crossing.

column2: 9. This road sign means:
10. If the entrance lane is too short to allow acceleration to highway speed, you should:
column4: merge into highway traffic as soon as possible.
column6: stop and wait for a large gap in traffic, then enter the highway and accelerate quickly.
column8: go to the next entrance ramp.

column2: 11. What should drivers do in case of a brake failure?
column10: Tie a white cloth on the left door handle.

column2: 12. This road sign means:
column4: Merge, then slow down to the safe speed indicated
column6: Winding road ahead; slow down to the indicated speed
column8: The road ahead curves right; slow down to indicated speed
column10: Divided highway begins. Slow down to the safe speed indicated

column2: 13. A flashing red light:
column4: means that you must bring your vehicle to a complete halt.
column8: means the same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 14. A broken yellow line alongside a solid yellow line means:
column4: Passing on the right is permitted in either direction
column6: Passing is not permitted in either direction
column8: Passing is permitted on the side of the solid yellow line
column10: Passing is permitted on the side of the broken yellow line

column2: 15. This road sign means:
16. Traffic lights are normally ____________ from the top to bottom or left to right.
17. This road sign warns drivers that:
column4: left turns are not allowed at the intersection.
column6: another traffic lane joins the one they are on.
column8: another road enters the highway from the direction shown.
column10: the road will make a sharp turn to the right.

column2: 18. This signal means:
19. You should never depend on your mirrors when you prepare to change lanes. Why?
column4: You should look over your shoulder instead.
column10: Mirrors leave “blind spots” behind both sides of vehicles.

column2: 20. This sign means:
column6: the road may be slippery when wet.
column10: no turns are allowed on this road.

column2: 21. This road sign means:
column4: A road joins from the right

column2: 22. At night, it is hardest to see:
23. Does a vehicle prepared to enter a traffic circle or rotary have right-of-way over vehicles in the circle?
column6: No. Vehicles already in the circle have the right-of-way.
column8: Only if the light is green.
column10: Yes, but only if they are entering the rotary from the right lane.

column2: 24. Drivers often fail to see a motorcycle headed toward them. Why?
column6: It is difficult to judge a motorcycle's speed.
column8: It is  hard to judge how far away a motorcycle is.

column2: 25. When passing other vehicles, drivers should:
column4: apply the brake and slow down.
column6: make sure the passing lane is clear of traffic, and check behind and to the left to make sure another vehicle is not attempting to pass.
column8: pass the vehicle as slowly as possible.
